page.title: 12Holy Trinity School Pond
page.content: One morning there was a digger that came to the school and dug a big hole. Then they put part of the pond in and built a wall round it. The reason for the pond to be there is for the children to study wildlife and nature in the pond. The men still had bricks left so they made some seats. Then water was put in. The children brought some lily leaves in with water snail eggs and lots of nice plants. Later on another man came and put some small stones in. A boy brought some sticklebacks. We have some tadpoles to put in but we can't put them in yet because the fish will eat them. The fish have now produced young and there are pond skaters and other insects in the pond. By Joanna King
